entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
